fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- A mutant killing will always spawn in a balanced rolelist, no more than 1 mutant killing may spawn.
- Factional chat
- Factional kill, it will be basic unless the user's attack value is higher, in which case it will be that value.
- All members have access to Ultimate abilities, they have their uses shared by all members, 1 for Killing, 2 for non-killing, members cannot use their Ultimate ability before day 2 and cannot use more than 1 per phase.
- All members have the following ability:
- Block: Give yourself Basic defense, will fail if used twice in a row.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Exterminate all who oppose the wrath of the Mutants

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Exterminate all who oppose the wrath of the Mutants
